about:
Greetings! I'm Melchisideck Jordan U. Datuin, a detail-oriented web developer aspiring to bring digital visions to life. With a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with proficiency in frameworks like React.js, I am well-versed in both front-end and back-end development. My journey into the web development realm has been further enriched by a comprehensive bootcamp, where I immersed myself in hands-on training, ensuring that I am well-equipped with the latest industry tools and methodologies, including version control systems like Git. 
 
 Beyond the lines of code, my diverse set of hobbies are playing computer games, basketball and I also enjoy cycling. I view web development not just as a profession but as a canvas for creative problem-solving. My career goal is to contribute meaningfully to the field, collaborating on innovative projects and staying at the forefront of technological advancements. Joining a web development bootcamp was a strategic move to stay ahead of the curve, ensuring that I can navigate the dynamic landscape of web development with confidence and creativity.
